Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Faster operation and enhanced system stability for all Windows systems.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size | All Windows Systems

English.Char_Desc_45: A fast and easy to use data backup system.
English.Char_Desc_80: A fast and easy to use data backup system.
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite File Backup Master is a backup software solution designed to backup your data either on the local computer or onto another system in the network. It's a multi-threaded program that can be used to backup your files and folders.
English.Char_Desc_450:
SSuite File Backup Master is a backup software solution designed to backup your data either on the local computer or onto another system in the network.
It's a multi-threaded program that can be used to backup your files and folders. The process of backing up data with SSuite File Backup Master is pretty fast, but it depends on the amount of files that have to be processed.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite File Backup Master is a backup software solution designed to backup your data either on the local computer or onto another system in the network.
It's a multi-threaded program that can be used to backup your files and folders. The process of backing up data with SSuite File Backup Master is pretty fast, but it depends on the amount of files that have to be processed.
You can backup any amount of folders and files, that are anywhere on your system. This application allows you to backup your files easy and fast(Uncompressed Backups). Copy your entire PC, including the operating system, applications, user settings, and all data. You have complete control over which files and folders to backup.
The main window allows you to easily define/run backup jobs. It shows all details of a new task straight in the main window, but also gives you access to all of its features with just a single click. This backup application offers an intuitive interface making all features easily accessible for both beginners and professionals.
Try our latest Web/Android app releases!
https://www.ssuiteoffice.com/categories/webapps.htm
This application is also completely and absolutely portable!
Please Note - If you are running this application on Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 and beyond, simply right-click on the executable and select the "Run as Administrator" option.
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time...
